{"id":1473184728,"question_id":3653,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 1 week","timestamp":1733630956,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1473184728/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Subarray Sum With Length Divisible by K","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long maxSubarraySum(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n        vector<long long> pref(N+1, 0);\n        for (int i=1; i<=N; i++) \n            pref[i] = pref[i-1] + nums[i-1];\n\n        long long ans = LLONG_MIN;\n        for (int s=0; s<k; s++) {\n            long long curr = -1e14;\n            for (int i=s; i+k<=N; i+=k) {\n                long long num = pref[i+k] - pref[i];\n                curr = max(num, curr + num);       \n                ans = max(ans, curr);\n            }\n            ans = max(ans, curr);\n        }\n\n        for (auto i : pref)\n            cout << i << \" \";\n        cout << endl;\n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-subarray-sum-with-length-divisible-by-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":960}
